sent.orig: The driver was flashing his lights to warn others of a speed trap.
sent.trans: 司机闪动了几下灯光，以提醒其他司机进入了测速区。

sent.orig: Said she: Tom, it was middling warm in school, warn't it?
sent.trans: 她说：“汤姆，学校里挺热的，对吧？”

sent.orig: You'll never get away with this, I warn you!
sent.trans: 我警告你，此事你决脱不了干系！

sent.orig: We are going to Warn theatre.
Economists warn that price controls encourage hoarding and can lead to supply shortfalls, fueling unrest.
sent.trans: 经济学家们警告说，价格控制会刺激人们囤积食品，从而导致供应短缺，进而引发社会动荡。
